title: Multiverse
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: multiverse-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20316
	- preferred-term:: Multiverse
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A network of interconnected but distinct metaverses and virtual worlds that enable cross-platform identity, asset portability, and interoperability while maintaining individual world sovereignty and distinct governance models.
	- source:: [[OMA3]], [[Metaverse Standards Forum]]
	- maturity:: draft
	- owl:class:: mv:Multiverse
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]], [[VirtualSocietyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: multiverse-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse Infrastructure]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Spatial Web]]
		- has-part:: [[Asset Translation Layer]]
		- has-part:: [[Federated Identity]]
		- has-part:: [[Interoperability Protocol]]
		- has-part:: [[Cross-Chain Bridge]]
		- has-part:: [[Universal Inventory]]
		- has-part:: [[Portal System]]
		- has-part:: [[Metaverse]]
		- has-part:: [[Multi-World Governance]]
		- requires:: [[Standard Format Support]]
		- requires:: [[Cross-Platform Authentication]]
		- requires:: [[Protocol Translation]]
		- requires:: [[Distributed Governance]]
		- requires:: [[Identity Federation]]
		- requires:: [[Asset Bridging]]
		- enables:: [[Federated Social Networks]]
		- enables:: [[Universal Avatar]]
		- enables:: [[Cross-World Travel]]
		- enables:: [[Asset Portability]]
		- enables:: [[Multi-Platform Gaming]]
		- enables:: [[Cross-Metaverse Commerce]]
		- depends-on:: [[Verifiable Credential]]
		- depends-on:: [[Smart Contract]]
		- depends-on:: [[Decentralized Identifier]]
		- depends-on:: [[Blockchain]]
		- depends-on:: [[Interoperability Standard]]

ontology.definition: A network of interconnected but distinct metaverses and virtual worlds that enable cross-platform identity, asset portability, and interoperability while maintaining individual world sovereignty and distinct governance models.
